C

Client - Class in model
Client represents the model of a client, with id, name, address and age.
Client(int, String, String, int) - Constructor for class model.Client
 
Client(String, String, int) - Constructor for class model.Client
 
ClientBLL - Class in bll
ClientBLL contains an instance variable of a Controller object and a ClientDAO one.
ClientBLL(ClientDAO, Controller) - Constructor for class bll.ClientBLL
 
ClientBLL.AddClientListener - Class in bll
It fetches the inputs from the ClientBoxView instance and creates a Client Object.
ClientBLL.RemoveClientListener - Class in bll
It retrieves the first input from the ClientBoxView object, which is actually the id of the client.
ClientBLL.UpdateClientListener - Class in bll
It retrieves the inputs from the ClientBoxView object and instantiates a client with those inputs.
ClientBLL.ViewListener - Class in bll
It creates a new instance of AllView and it calls upon its constructor, having as parameter a JTable returned from the getTable method from ClientDAO
ClientBoxView - Class in presentation
ClientBoxView is used to get the information for the clients that are to be added, removed or updated.
ClientBoxView() - Constructor for class presentation.ClientBoxView
 
ClientDAO - Class in dao
ClientDAO extends AbstractDAO with the type parameter Client, having the inherited methods to access the database.
ClientDAO() - Constructor for class dao.ClientDAO
 
ClientView - Class in presentation
ClientView is the GUI Window set for configuring the clients in the database, as having buttons for adding, removing, updating or viewing all clients
ClientView() - Constructor for class presentation.ClientView
 
close() - Method in class presentation.ClientBoxView
 
close() - Method in class presentation.ClientView
 
close() - Method in class presentation.ProductView
 
close() - Method in class presentation.StartView
 
close(Connection) - Static method in class connection.ConnectionFactory
It closes the connection to the database
close(ResultSet) - Static method in class connection.ConnectionFactory
It closes the result set resulted from the execution of the statements
close(Statement) - Static method in class connection.ConnectionFactory
It closes the statement
connection - package connection
 
ConnectionFactory - Class in connection
ConnectionFactory is a class used to establish the connection between the database and the program
Controller - Class in presentation
The controller manages the GUI windows and retrieves/gives the necessary data from the GUI and to the business logic objects.
Controller(StartView, ProductView, OrderView, ClientView, ClientBoxView, ProductBoxView) - Constructor for class presentation.Controller
 
createBill(Order, Client, Product) - Method in class bll.OrderBLL
It creates the bill as a text file, using a Random object to generate a random number identifier for the bill, a File and BufferedWriter objects to actually create the bill.
createInsertStatement(Client) - Method in class dao.ClientDAO
It creates the insert statement based on the declared fields of the Client object
createInsertStatement(Order) - Method in class dao.OrderDAO
It creates the insert statement based on the declared fields of the Order object
createInsertStatement(Product) - Method in class dao.ProductDAO
It creates the insert statement based on the declared fields of the Product object
createInsertStatement(T) - Method in class dao.AbstractDAO
It creates the insert statement that is used in the insert method, which is abstract due to the difference in the string building of each object
CreateOrderListener() - Constructor for class bll.OrderBLL.CreateOrderListener
 
createUpdateQuery(Client) - Method in class dao.ClientDAO

createUpdateQuery(Product) - Method in class dao.ProductDAO
It creates the update query based on the declared fields of the Product object
createUpdateQuery(T) - Method in class dao.AbstractDAO
It creates the update statement that is used in the update method, which is abstract due to the difference in the string building of each object
